entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow or drizzle beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning. Snow over higher terrain late in the morning and early afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
